name: instFiniteAdditive
initialProofState:
α : Type u
inst✝ : Finite α
⊢ Finite (Additive α)
decl:
instance [Finite α] : Finite (Additive α) :=
  Finite.of_equiv α (by rfl)

name: instFiniteMultiplicative
initialProofState:
α : Type u
inst✝ : Finite α
⊢ Finite (Multiplicative α)
decl:
instance [Finite α] : Finite (Multiplicative α) :=
  Finite.of_equiv α (by rfl)

name: instInfiniteAdditive
initialProofState:
α : Type u
h : Infinite α
⊢ Infinite (Additive α)
decl: instance [h : Infinite α] : Infinite (Additive α) := h

name: instInfiniteMultiplicative
initialProofState:
α : Type u
h : Infinite α
⊢ Infinite (Multiplicative α)
decl: instance [h : Infinite α] : Infinite (Multiplicative α) := h
